articles.summary: Motley Fool: Netflix Stock: Buy, Sell, or Hold?. Netflix's Warner Bros. deal puts capital discipline -- and valuation -- under a harsher spotlight. Related tickers mentioned: WBD.

articles.title: Warner faces a surprise new bid as investors do the real math
articles.mainIdea: Warner faces a surprise new bid as investors do the real math
articles.summary: TheStreet: Warner faces a surprise new bid as investors do the real math. Warner Bros. Discovery confirmed that it received an amended, unsolicited tender offer from Paramount Skydance to acquire all outstanding shares. The media giant said that under the terms of its current arrangement with Netflix, its board will consider the offer with advisors. However, it also made ... Related tickers mentioned: PSKY, WBD.
